blocks.name: pwssplit4
blocks.content: Splitting for structure powers 4: maps isomorphically onto the other half. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Jan-2015.)

thm pwslnmlem0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, clnm))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c0, cpws, emptycls))
} = {
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, clnm), wcel(c1, clmod), wcel(cfv(cbs, c1), cfn))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, clmod), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  pwslmod(c0, emptycls, universe, c1)
  syl6eqelr(cfv(cbs, c1), cfn, co(cfv(cbs, c0), cmap, emptycls), wcel(c0, clmod))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(co(cfv(cbs, c0), cmap, emptycls), cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  pwsbas(c0, clmod, emptycls, universe, cfv(cbs, c0), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqeltri(co(cfv(cbs, c0), cmap, emptycls), cfn, csn(emptycls))
  eqtri(co(cfv(cbs, c0), cmap, emptycls), csn(emptycls), c1o)
  ax-mp(wceq(co(cfv(cbs, c0), cmap, emptycls), c1o), wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), universe))
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  map0e(cfv(cbs, c0), universe)
  df1o2()
  snfi(emptycls)
  filnm(c1, cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
}

  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqeltri(((Base ` c0)[↦]∅), cfn, { ∅ })

  map0e((Base ` c0), universe)
  df1o2()
  snfi(emptycls)
  filnm(c1, (Base ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
}

thm pwslnmlem1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, clnm))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c0, cpws, csn(cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, clnm)), diffsc(s0, c0))
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, clnm), wcel(cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), csn(cv(hs0)))), co(c0, clmhm, c1)), wcel(c0, clnm), wceq(crn(cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), csn(cv(hs0))))), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  sylancl(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), csn(cv(hs0)))), co(c0, clmhm, c1)), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(csn(cv(s0)), universe))
  lnmlmod(c0)
  snex(cv(s0))
  pwsdiaglmhm(hs0, c0, csn(cv(s0)), universe, cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), csn(cv(hs0)))), c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  id(wcel(c0, clnm))
  3syl(wcel(c0, clnm), wceq(crn(cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), csn(cv(hs0))))), cfv(cbs, c1)), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wfo(cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  elvd(s0, wcel(c0, clnm), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  pwssnf1o(hs0, c0, clnm, cv(s0), universe, cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), csn(cv(hs0)))))
  f1ofo(cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1))
  forn(cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1))
  lnmepi(cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), csn(cv(hs0)))), c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c1))
}

  ⊣ c1 =(c0[^]{ s0 })

  sylancl(c0 ∈ LNoeM, (hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)↦({ s0 } × { hs0 }))∈(c0[LMHom]c1), c0 ∈ LMod, { s0 } ∈ 𝕌)
  lnmlmod(c0)
  snex(s0)
  pwsdiaglmhm(hs0, c0, { s0 }, universe, (hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)↦({ s0 } × { hs0 })), c1, (Base ` c0))
  id(c0 ∈ LNoeM)
  3syl(c0 ∈ LNoeM, ran((hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)↦({ s0 } × { hs0 })))=(Base ` c1), ((hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)↦({ s0 } × { hs0 })):(Base ` c0)↔(Base ` c1)), ((hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)↦({ s0 } × { hs0 })):(Base ` c0)↠(Base ` c1)))
  elvd(s0, c0 ∈ LNoeM, ((hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)↦({ s0 } × { hs0 })):(Base ` c0)↔(Base ` c1)))
  pwssnf1o(hs0, c0, clnm, s0, universe, (hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)↦({ s0 } × { hs0 })), (Base ` c0), (Base ` c1), c1)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)↦({ s0 } × { hs0 })))
  f1ofo((hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)↦({ s0 } × { hs0 })), (Base ` c0), (Base ` c1))
  forn((hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)↦({ s0 } × { hs0 })), (Base ` c0), (Base ` c1))
  lnmepi((hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)↦({ s0 } × { hs0 })), c0, c1, (Base ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 })
  diff.hs0.c(universe)

  syl3anc(w0, c0 ∈ LNoeM, (hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)↦(hs0 |` c1))∈(c0[LMHom]c3), (c0[|`s](`'(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)↦(hs0 |` c1))" {(0 ` c3)}))∈ LNoeM, (c3[|`s]ran((hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)↦(hs0 |` c1))))∈ LNoeM)

  pwssplit3(hs0, c4, (c1 ⋃ c2), universe, c1, (hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)↦(hs0 |` c1)), c0, c3, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c3))
  eqeltrd((c0[|`s](`'(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)↦(hs0 |` c1))" {(0 ` c3)})), clnm, (c0[|`s]{ hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)|(hs0 |` c1)=(c1 × {(0 ` c4)})}), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cress, (`'(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)↦(hs0 |` c1))" {(0 ` c3)}), { hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)|(hs0 |` c1)=(c1 × {(0 ` c4)})}, w0)
  syl5eq((`'(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)↦(hs0 |` c1))" {(0 ` c3)}), { hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)|(hs0 |` c1)=(c1 × {(0 ` c4)})}, { hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)|(hs0 |` c1)=(0 ` c3)}, w0)

blocks.name: pwslnm
blocks.content: Finite powers of Noetherian modules are Noetherian. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)

thm pwslnm(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, cfn)), wcel(c2, clnm))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c0, cpws, c1))
} = {
  syl5eqel(c2, clnm, co(c0, cpws, c1), wa(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, cfn)))
  impcom(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(co(c0, cpws, c1), clnm))
  findcard2s(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, wi(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, c1), clnm)), wi(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs0)), clnm)), wi(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, emptycls), clnm)), wi(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs1)), clnm)), wi(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))), clnm)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs0)), clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, emptycls), clnm))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs0)), clnm, co(c0, cpws, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, c0, cpws)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs0)), clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs1)), clnm))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs0)), clnm, co(c0, cpws, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, cpws)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))), wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs0)), clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))), clnm))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs0)), clnm, co(c0, cpws, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c0, cpws)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs0)), clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, c1), clnm))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs0)), clnm, co(c0, cpws, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0, cpws)
  syl(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, emptycls), clnm), wcel(c0, clmod))
  pwslnmlem0(c0, co(c0, cpws, emptycls))
  eqid(co(c0, cpws, emptycls))
  a2d(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cfn), wn(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs1)), clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))), clnm))
  exp32(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cfn), wn(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs1)), clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))), clnm))
  pwslnmlem2(co(c0, cpws, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))), cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)), co(c0, cpws, cv(hs1)), c0, co(c0, cpws, csn(cv(hs2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cfn), wn(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wa(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs1)), clnm))))
  vex(hs1)
  snex(cv(hs2))
  eqid(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs1)))
  eqid(co(c0, cpws, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))))
  ad2antrl(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cfn), wn(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs1)), clnm), wcel(c0, clmod))
  lnmlmod(c0)
  ad2antlr(wcel(cv(hs1), cfn), wn(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs1)), clnm)), wceq(cin(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), emptycls))

  ad2antrl(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cfn), wn(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs1)), clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, csn(cv(hs2))), clnm))

  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)

  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs1)), clnm)))

  diff.hs1.w(wi(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs0)), clnm)))
  diff.hs2.w(wi(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs0)), clnm)))

thm pwslnm(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ LNoeM ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)→ c2 ∈ LNoeM)
  ⊣ c2 =(c0[^]c1)
} = {
  syl5eqel(c2, clnm, (c0[^]c1), (c0 ∈ LNoeM ∧ c1 ∈ Fin))
  impcom(c0 ∈ LNoeM, c1 ∈ Fin, (c0[^]c1)∈ LNoeM)
  findcard2s(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, (c0 ∈ LNoeM →(c0[^]c1)∈ LNoeM), (c0 ∈ LNoeM →(c0[^]hs0)∈ LNoeM), (c0 ∈ LNoeM →(c0[^]∅)∈ LNoeM), (c0 ∈ LNoeM →(c0[^]hs1)∈ LNoeM), (c0 ∈ LNoeM →(c0[^](hs1 ⋃ { hs2 }))∈ LNoeM))
  imbi2d(hs0 = ∅, c0 ∈ LNoeM, (c0[^]hs0)∈ LNoeM, (c0[^]∅)∈ LNoeM)
  eleq1d((c0[^]hs0), clnm, (c0[^]∅), hs0 = ∅)
  oveq2(hs0, emptycls, c0, cpws)
  imbi2d(hs0 = hs1, c0 ∈ LNoeM, (c0[^]hs0)∈ LNoeM, (c0[^]hs1)∈ LNoeM)
  eleq1d((c0[^]hs0), clnm, (c0[^]hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  oveq2(hs0, hs1, c0, cpws)
  imbi2d(hs0 =(hs1 ⋃ { hs2 }), c0 ∈ LNoeM, (c0[^]hs0)∈ LNoeM, (c0[^](hs1 ⋃ { hs2 }))∈ LNoeM)
  eleq1d((c0[^]hs0), clnm, (c0[^](hs1 ⋃ { hs2 })), hs0 =(hs1 ⋃ { hs2 }))
  oveq2(hs0, (hs1 ⋃ { hs2 }), c0, cpws)
  imbi2d(hs0 = c1, c0 ∈ LNoeM, (c0[^]hs0)∈ LNoeM, (c0[^]c1)∈ LNoeM)
  eleq1d((c0[^]hs0), clnm, (c0[^]c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, c0, cpws)
  syl(c0 ∈ LNoeM, (c0[^]∅)∈ LNoeM, c0 ∈ LMod)
  pwslnmlem0(c0, (c0[^]∅))
  eqid((c0[^]∅))
  a2d((hs1 ∈ Fin ∧ ¬ hs2 ∈ hs1), c0 ∈ LNoeM, (c0[^]hs1)∈ LNoeM, (c0[^](hs1 ⋃ { hs2 }))∈ LNoeM)
  exp32((hs1 ∈ Fin ∧ ¬ hs2 ∈ hs1), c0 ∈ LNoeM, (c0[^]hs1)∈ LNoeM, (c0[^](hs1 ⋃ { hs2 }))∈ LNoeM)
  pwslnmlem2((c0[^](hs1 ⋃ { hs2 })), hs1, { hs2 }, (c0[^]hs1), c0, (c0[^]{ hs2 }), ((hs1 ∈ Fin ∧ ¬ hs2 ∈ hs1)∧(c0 ∈ LNoeM ∧(c0[^]hs1)∈ LNoeM)))
  vex(hs1)
  snex(hs2)
  eqid((c0[^]hs1))
  eqid((c0[^](hs1 ⋃ { hs2 })))
  ad2antrl((hs1 ∈ Fin ∧ ¬ hs2 ∈ hs1), c0 ∈ LNoeM, (c0[^]hs1)∈ LNoeM, c0 ∈ LMod)
  lnmlmod(c0)
  ad2antlr(hs1 ∈ Fin, ¬ hs2 ∈ hs1, (c0 ∈ LNoeM ∧(c0[^]hs1)∈ LNoeM), (hs1 ⋂ { hs2 })= ∅)
  biimpri(¬ hs2 ∈ hs1, (hs1 ⋂ { hs2 })= ∅)
  disjsn(hs1, hs2)
  simprr((hs1 ∈ Fin ∧ ¬ hs2 ∈ hs1), c0 ∈ LNoeM, (c0[^]hs1)∈ LNoeM)
  ad2antrl((hs1 ∈ Fin ∧ ¬ hs2 ∈ hs1), c0 ∈ LNoeM, (c0[^]hs1)∈ LNoeM, (c0[^]{ hs2 })∈ LNoeM)
  pwslnmlem1(hs2, c0, (c0[^]{ hs2 }))
  eqid((c0[^]{ hs2 }))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ LNoeM →(c0[^]c1)∈ LNoeM))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ LNoeM →(c0[^]∅)∈ LNoeM))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ LNoeM →(c0[^]hs1)∈ LNoeM))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ LNoeM →(c0[^](hs1 ⋃ { hs2 }))∈ LNoeM))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ∈ LNoeM →(c0[^]hs0)∈ LNoeM))
  diff.hs2.w((c0 ∈ LNoeM →(c0[^]hs0)∈ LNoeM))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}
